Input: To automatically generate a route along important places in a city
So I don't need to search the web first to find the places I want to visit
I would like to be able to increase or doube the size of the characters from the street names
So I can read the names and still have the overview on the map
I would like to be able to see the routes I walked in the past
So I can see where I have or haven't been yet
I would like to be able to find which streets are used by cars
I want to be able to make a route which avoids (as much as possible) traffic lights and intersections
